/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the scene below. The street, teeming with life, stretches out ahead, flanked by towering buildings on either side. Cars and buses, the lifeblood of the city, move along the road, their colors muted under the overcast sky. Overhead, power lines crisscross, forming a complex web against the backdrop of the gray sky. The image is bathed in the soft light of an overcast day, casting long shadows and highlighting the architectural details of the buildings. Despite the absence of vibrant colors, the image paints a vivid picture of urban life in Beijing.
